ygData.subject: Re: Factions
ygData.msgSnippet: My ranger fought in Crush castle for a fair part of 2 weeks til I finally got my tunic.  The Prophet, Emperor Crush and Lord Darish do not effect your Neriak
ygData.messageBody:
My ranger fought in Crush castle for a fair part of 2 weeks til I finally
got my tunic. The Prophet, Emperor Crush and Lord Darish do not effect your
Neriak standing. Not sure about the royal guard. All other orcs do effect
your standing.

Considering that most of the time I fought Crush without other orcs around I
think I can swing that dwarven tunic for myself without adversly effecting
my Neriak standing. If I can't then I will just head off to Unrest...which
was my plan. It will just be without some of the goodies I wanted.



-----Original Message-----
From: Mallachyte@... <Mallachyte@...>
To: warriors_eq@onelist.com <warriors_eq@onelist.com>
Date: Wednesday, June 16, 1999 4:19 PM
Subject: Re: [warriors_eq] Factions


>From: Mallachyte@...
>
>In a message dated 6/16/99 8:53:48 AM Pacific Daylight Time,
>tswift@... writes:
>
><< My standing in Neriak is perfectly fine.
>
> I only killed Deathfist orcs which raises faction with Neriak and
Freeport.
> I have not yet travelled to Crushbone. THough I am going. Emperor Crush
> and his court don't reduce faction with Neriak, with the exception of
Dvinn.
> I won't be killing Dvinn though.
>
> I may be a bit of a Rogue, but I am loyal to my race. >>
>
>Don't count on it. Kill any Crushbone orc, I repeat ANY crushbone orc, and
>you lose faction with Neriak.
>
